name: Crud Application
overview: This is a full-stack CRUD application built using the MERN stack. The application allows users to Create, Read, Update, and Delete user data efficiently. It features a dynamic and interactive UI, a secure backend, and seamless database integration.
technologies: Frontend: React.js, React Router, Tailwind CSS Backend: Node.js, Express.js Database: MongoDB (Mongoose for schema modeling) tate Management: useState, useEffect, useContext API Communication: Axios for fetching and modifying data

name: PicSpehere
overview: This is a photo uploading website built using Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and Multer for handling image uploads. The application allows users to create profiles, upload photos, and manage their personal image gallery efficiently.
technologies: Frontend: React.js, React Router, Tailwind CSS Backend: Node.js, Express.js Database: MongoDB  Authentication: JWT (JSON Web Token) for secure login

name: Chat Application
overview: It allows multiple users to join a chat room, send messages instantly, and see the live member count. The app ensures seamless communication by handling multiple connections efficiently. Perfect for understanding real-time messaging systems like WhatsApp group chats.
technologies: WebSockets, Node.js, Express, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Calculator
overview: This is a simple calculator application built using ReactJS. It provides a user-friendly interface to perform basic arithmetic operations such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. The calculator is designed with a clean UI and real-time result updates.
technologies: Frontend: React.js (useState for managing input and results) Styling: CSS
